Ahmed Ayad (Arabic) nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya dịka Rouiched; bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe ọchị na onye na-agụ egwu, a mụrụ n'ọnwa Eprel 28, 1921 na Algiers wee nwụọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 28, 1999 na El Biar (Algiers).
Rouiched si Kabylie (Obodo Azeffoun, Aarch Ait Djennad, Wilaya nke Tizi-Ouzou)
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, o nwere ọtụtụ ọrụ iji dịrị ndụ
N'ịbụ onye gụrụ akwụkwọ n'onwe ya, ọ banyere n'ọkwa na nke mbụ ya n'ihe nkiri nke Abdelhamid Ababsa nke a na-akpọ 意 Estardjâ Ya Assiya
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, o tinyere onwe ya na oge ya na nka, wee bụrụ onye ndú nke ndị na-ese ihe
Ya na ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke oge ahụ rụkọrọ ọrụ: Rachid Ksentini, Mustapha Badie, Nadjat Tounsi, Sid-Ali Fernandel, Mohamed Touri, Mustapha Kateb.
Mgbe nnwere onwe nke Algeria n'afọ 1962, ọ bụ onye otu Algeria National Theater
Mana ihe ịga nke ọma ya kachasị ukwuu bụ ihe nkiri nke Mohamed Lakhdar-Hamina
Ọ gara n'ihu n'ọrụ ya na telivishọn Algeria ma rụọ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na telivikọn ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ.
Akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu nke ndị na-agụ egwú na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na Algeria, Achour Cheurfi, ANEP Ed
